text:
August 111, 1959
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
V. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Dr. Seayt
Dr. Skornia is taking a well-de served vacation for a couple of weeks,
but I wanted to let you know that your letter of August 21 has been
received, and as soon as Dr. Skornia returns it will be called to his
attention. I expect that shortly thereafter he will be writing to
you shout the reasoning behind our consideration of a possible move
to Washington*
I know I speak fear Dr. Skornia when I say that we sue delighted
that you will be able to spend a couple of d^rs at our convention.
WbÂ«11 be looking forward to seeing you then.
Sincerely,
IEHjJO
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
